mapper.select: SELECT uid, cls, sn, model, spec, war_start, war_end, manu_com, mac, state, year, equipInsert,equipUpdate FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE (#{model} IS NULL OR TRIM(model) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{model}), '%'))

SELECT uid, cls, sn, model, spec, war_start, war_end, manu_com, mac, state, year, equipInsert,equipUpdate FROM EQUIPMENT WHERE (#{model} IS NULL OR TRIM(model) LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{model}), '%')) AND CLS = #{cls}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EQUIPMENT(CLS, SN, MODEL, SPEC, WAR_START, WAR_END, MANU_COM, MAC, STATE, YEAR) VALUES (#{cls}, #{sn}, #{model}, #{spec}, #{warStart}, #{warEnd}, #{manuCom}, #{mac}, #{state}, #{year})
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT SET CLS = #{cls}, SN = #{sn}, MODEL = #{model}, SPEC = #{spec}, WAR_START = #{warStart}, WAR_END = #{warEnd}, MANU_COM = #{manuCom}, MAC = #{mac}, STATE = #{state}, YEAR = #{year}, equipUpdate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE UID = #{uid}
